# ASAccessoryEventType.accessoryRemoved

**Case**

The session removed an accessory.

## Declaration

```swift
case accessoryRemoved
```

## Accessory events

- **ASAccessoryEventType.accessoryAdded**: The session added an accessory.
- **ASAccessoryEventType.accessoryChanged**: The properties of an accessory changed.

items.description: The properties of an accessory changed.
